DOC.brief_summary: The purpose clinical investigation gather pilot data evaluate impact use Eeva™ , time-lapse enable embryo test , combination traditional morphology clinical pregnancy rate .
DOC.criteria: Women undergo fresh vitro fertilization treatment use egg ≤ 40 year ≥ 4 diploid embryo ( i.e . 2 PNs ) ≤ 3 Prior ART cycle ( IVF , ICSI relate procedure ) All 2PN embryo ( 3 arm ) must image Eeva Subject willing comply study protocol procedure Subject willing provide write informed consent Preimplantation genetic diagnosis preimplantation genetic screening Planned `` freeze '' cycle ( eggs embryo ) Asherman 's Syndrome Donor egg Gestational carrier Presence Hydrosalpinx ultrasound Concurrent participation interventional clinical study
